home.title: EmpowerHub
home.subtitle: Go Maatlafatša Basadi ka Thekgo ye e Kopantšwego
home.tagline: Go maatlafatša boikemelo, polokego le seriti.

financialSupport.title: Thekgo ya Tšhelete
financialSupport.description: Hwetša dikeletšo tša peeletšo tše di rulagantšwego go wena gomme o tsenele dipuišanong tša tšhelete tše di maatlafatšago.

gbvSupport.title: Thekgo ya GBV
gbvSupport.description: Hwetša thekgo ye e bonako le mafelo a a bolokegilego a bodulo ge o a nyaka kudu.

sanitaryAid.title: Thušo ya Bohlweki
sanitaryAid.description: Hwetša mabokose a dineelo a a kgaufsi le go fihlelela didirišwa tša bohlweki tše bohlokwa.

aiAssistant.title: Mothušiši wa AI
aiAssistant.description: Hwetša dikarabo tše di bonako le tlhahlo go tšwa tshepedišong ya rena ya thekgo ye e botlhale.

submitRequests.title: Romela Dikgopelo
submitRequests.description: Romela gomme o latele dikgopelo tša gago tša thekgo ka tshepedišo ya rena ye e bonolo go e šomiša.

aboutUs.title: Ka Rena
aboutUs.description: Ithute go feta ka maikemišetšo a rena a go maatlafatša basadi go ralala Afrika Borwa.

cta.title: O Itokišeditše go Thoma?
cta.description: Kopana le dikete tša basadi bao ba humanego thekgo le maatlafatšo mo sethokgweng sa rena.
cta.button: Romela Kgopelo ya Gago ya Mathomo

requests.title: Dikgopelo tša Thušo
requests.subtitle: Romela dikgopelo tše mpsha gomme o latele tšeo di lego gona
requests.noRequestsDesc: Thoma ka go romela kgopelo ya gago ya mathomo ya thušo
requests.name: Leina

req001.description: Ke nyaka dikeletšo tša go beeletša tšhelete kgwebong ye nnyane

req002.name: Ga se tsebege
req002.description: Ke hloka tsebo ya lefelo le le bolokegilego ka pela

req003.description: Ke nyaka mabokose a mpho a kgauswi a dilo tša bohlweki

finance.title: Go Maatlafatša ka Tšhelete
finance.subtitle: Hwetša dikeletšo tša tšhelete tše di rulagantšwego go wena, tsenela dipuišanong tša tšhelete tše di maatlafatšago, gomme o age tsela ya gago ya ekonomi

seminar1.title: Basadi Kgwebong: Go Thoma Leeto la Gago la Tšhelete
seminar1.location: Senthara ya Setšhaba ya Cape Town
seminar1.description: Ithute motheo wa go beeletša tšhelete le gore o ka thoma bjang go aga leruo la gago la kamoso.

seminar2.title: Thuto ya go Ikemela ka Tšhelete
seminar2.description: Mekgwa ye e šomago ya go fihlelela go ikemela ka tšhelete bjalo ka mosadi yo a ikemelago.

seminar3.title: Go Bala Tšhelete le go Boloka ga Basadi ba ba Ikemelago
seminar3.description: Bokgoni bjo bo bohlokwa bja go bala tšhelete le mekgwa ya go boloka ye e rulagantšwego basadi ba ba ikemelago.

emergencyFund.title: Aga Mokotla wa Maemo a Bohlokwa
emergencyFund.description: Thoma ka go boloka ditshenyegelo tša dikgwedi tše 3-6 maemong a a sa letelwago.

education.title: Beeletša Thutong ya Tšhelete
education.description: Tsebo ke maatla. Ithute ka go bala tšhelete, go beeletša, le go rulaganya tšhelete.

diversifyIncome.title: Fapantšha Letseno la Gago
diversifyIncome.description: Aga methopo ye mentši ya letseno go oketša go tiišega ga tšhelete.

retirement.title: Rulaganya Boikhurišo ka Pela
retirement.description: Ge o thoma ka pela, tšhelete ya gago e na le nako ye ntši ya go gola.

trackExpenses.title: Latela Ditshenyegelo tša Gago
trackExpenses.description: Go kwešiša gore tšhelete ya gago e ya kae ke kgato ya mathomo ya go laola tšhelete.

sanitaryAid.title: Thušo ya Bohlweki & Thekgo ya Bophelo
sanitaryAid.subtitle: Hwetša dilo tša mahala tša bohlweki le dinyakwa tša bophelo mabokoseng a rena a mpho Afrika Borwa

capeTown.name: Senthara ya Setšhaba ya Cape Town
capeTown.address: 123 Main Street, Cape Town, Western Cape
capeTown.description: Senthara ye kgolo ya setšhaba ye e fago dilo tša bohlokwa tša bohlweki go basadi ba lefelo.

johannesburg.name: Senthara ya Basadi ya Johannesburg
johannesburg.description: Senthara ye e ikgafiditšego go thuša basadi ka dilo tša bohlweki le thušo.

durban.name: Senthara ya Maphelo ya Durban
durban.description: Senthara ya maphelo ye e fago dilo tša bohlweki le thuto ya maphelo.

tips.tip1: Fetola maphedi goba ditampon ka mehla ka diiri tše 4-6
tips.tip2: Hlapa matsogo a gago pele le ka morago ga go šomiša dilo tša kgwedi
tips.tip3: Šomiša dihlahiswa tše di hlwekilego tše di se nago kotsi
tips.tip4: Boloka dihlahiswa tše di sa šomišwago lefelong le le omilego, le le fodilego

tips.tip1: Hlapa mmele ka moka letšatši le lengwe le le lengwe ka sesepe se se hlwekilego
tips.tip2: Apara diaparo tše di hlwekilego, tše di omilego
tips.tip3: Boloka lefelo la gago la sephiri le hlwekile le le omile
tips.tip4: Nwa meetse a mantši gomme o je dijo tše di nago le phepo ye botse

tips.tip1: Malapeng a hlwekilego a ka šomišwa bjalo ka kgetho ya nakwana
tips.tip2: Dijo tše di ruthetšego di ka thuša go fokotša bohloko bja kgwedi
tips.tip3: Meetse a a ruthetšego a ka thuša go khutšiša mesifa
tips.tip4: Nyaka thušo ya dingaka ge go na le mathata a a sa tlwaelegago

donation.title: Nea Dilo
donation.description: Re amogela dimpho tša dilo tša bohlweki go thuša basadi ba lefelo. Tše ke dilo tše di nyakwago kudu:

items.sanitaryProducts: Dihlahiswa tša bohlweki bja kgwedi (maphedi, ditampon, dikomiki)
items.hygieneItems: Dilo tša bohlweki (sesepe, shampoo, borašhe ya meno)
items.underwear: Diaparo tša ka gare tše mpsha, tše di sa šomišwago

donation.learnMore: Ithute go Feta ka go Nea

gbvSupport.title: Thušo ya GBV & Mafelo a go Sireletša
gbvSupport.subtitle: Hwetša thušo ya ka pela, mafelo a go sireletša a bolokegilego, le dikeletšo tša dingaka tša go feta tlhekefetšo ya bong
gbvSupport.emergencyAlert: Ge o le maemong a bohlokwa, letsetsa 10111 goba 112 ka pela

safeShelters.title: Mafelo a go Sireletša a Bolokegilego
safeShelters.subtitle: Mafelo a sephiri a go sireletša basadi bao ba nyakago lefelo la go sireletša
safeShelters.contactShelter: Ikgokaganye le Lefelo la go Sireletša

safeHaven.name: Lefelo la go Sireletša la Safe Haven
safeHaven.services: Bodulo, dijo, thekgo ya monagano, thušo ya molao
safeHaven.description: Lefelo la go sireletša la 24/7 la basadi bao ba nyakago lefelo la go sireletša ka pela.

newBeginnings.name: Senthara ya New Beginnings
newBeginnings.services: Bodulo bja nakwana, tlhahlo ya mošomo, thuto ya bana
newBeginnings.description: Senthara ye e thušago basadi le go aga go ikemela.

hopeCentre.name: Senthara ya Hope Centre
hopeCentre.services: Thekgo ya monagano, tlhahlo ya molao, thušo ya maphelo
hopeCentre.description: Senthara ye e fago thekgo ye e feletšego go basadi ba ba hutsafetšego.

emergencyContacts.title: Ikgokaganyo ya Maemo a Bohlokwa
emergencyContacts.subtitle: Dinomoro tša go letsetsa ge o nyaka thušo ka pela

gbvCommand.name: GBV Command Centre
gbvCommand.description: Thušo ya ka pela ya GBV ya naga ka moka
gbvCommand.languages: Maleme ka moka a Afrika Borwa

lifeline.name: Lifeline
lifeline.languages: Seisemane, Seafrikanse, le maleme a mantši

childline.name: Childline
childline.description: Thušo ya bana ba ba hutsafetšego
childline.languages: Maleme ka moka a Afrika Borwa

police.name: Maphodisa
police.description: Thušo ya maphodisa ya maemo a bohlokwa
police.languages: Maleme ka moka a Afrika Borwa

legalResources.title: Thekgo ya Molao
legalResources.subtitle: Hwetša tsebo ka ga ditokelo tša gago le gore o ka hwetša bjang thušo ya molao

legalAid.title: Legal Aid South Africa
legalAid.description: Thušo ya molao ya mahala go basadi bao ba nyakago
legalAid.services: Tlhahlo ya molao, go emetšwa dikgotleng, thekgo ya molao

wlce.title: Women's Legal Centre
wlce.description: Senthara ye e ikgafiditšego go thuša basadi ka molao
wlce.services: Tlhahlo ya molao, thuto ya ditokelo, tšhireletšo

familyLaw.title: Tlhahlo ya Molao wa Lapa
familyLaw.description: Thušo ya molao ya ditaba tša lapa
familyLaw.services: Kgaogano, go godišetša bana, bophelo bja batho ba babedi

supportGroups.title: Dihlopha tša Thekgo
supportGroups.subtitle: Ikgokaganye le basadi ba bangwe bao ba fetilego dilo tše di swanago

survivors.name: Sehlopha sa Bao ba Pholosegile
survivors.schedule: Laboraro beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe ka 18:00
survivors.description: Sehlopha se sephiri sa bao ba pholosegile ba GBV

healing.name: Sehlopha sa go Phola
healing.schedule: Labone beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe ka 19:00
healing.description: Sehlopha se se lebantšhego go phola ga monagano

empowerment.name: Sehlopha sa go Maatlafatša
empowerment.schedule: Mokibelo beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe ka 10:00
empowerment.description: Sehlopha se se maatlafatšago basadi le go aga go ikemela

tips.tip1: Fetola tsela ya gago ya go sepela ka mehla
tips.tip2: Botša motho yo mongwe gore o ya kae
tips.tip3: Boloka nomoro ya go letsetsa ya maemo a bohlokwa e lokile
tips.tip4: Tshephe maikutlo a gago - ge go bonala go sa bolokege, tšwa

tips.tip1: Šomiša diphasewete tše matla gomme o di fetoše ka mehla
tips.tip2: Hlahloba dipeakanyo tša gago tša social media
tips.tip3: Tseba gore o ka pata bjang lefelo la gago
tips.tip4: Šomiša browser ya private mode ge o nyaka thušo

emergencyPreparedness.title: go Itokišetša ga Maemo a Bohlokwa

tips.tip1: Dira leano le sephiri la go baleha
tips.tip2: Boloka tšhelete, ditokomane, le diaparo mafelong a sephiri
tips.tip3: Tseba dinomoro tše di swanetšego tša go letsetsa
tips.tip4: Rulaganya lefelo la go sireletša leo o ka yago go lona

aiAssistant.title: Mothušiši wa AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Botšiša dipotšišo tša gago gomme o hwetše dikeletšo tše di rulagantšwego
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Dumela! Ke mothušiši wa gago wa AI. Nka go thuša bjang lehono?

questions.financialSeminars: Nka hwetša bjang tsebo ka ga dipuišano tša mali?
questions.safeShelters: Nka hwetša kae mafelo a polokego a bolokegilego?
questions.sanitaryProducts: Nka hwetša bjang dilo tša bohlweki?
questions.submitRequest: Nka romela bjang kgopelo ya thušo?
questions.availableServices: Ke ditirelo dife tše di lego gona?

chatHistory.title: Histori ya Poledišano
chatHistory.empty: Ga go na histori ya poledišano

mockResponses.response1: Ke a kwešiša! Re ka go thuša ka dipuišano tše di fapafapanego tša mali. Lebelela letlakala la rena la Finance go hwetša tsebo ye e feletšego ka ga dipuišano tše di tlago.
mockResponses.response2: Polokego ya gago e bohlokwa. Re ka go thuša ka mafelo a go sireletša a bolokegilego, dinomoro tša maemo a bohlokwa, le thekgo ya molao. Lebelela letlakala la rena la GBV Support.
mockResponses.response3: Re na le mabokose a mpho a dilo tša bohlweki go ralala Afrika Borwa. Lebelela letlakala la rena la Sanitary Aid go hwetša lefelo le le gaufi le wena.
mockResponses.response4: Re ka go kgokaganya le thušo ya molao ya mahala. Legal Aid South Africa e fa thušo ya mahala go basadi bao ba nyakago. Letsetsa 0800 110 110.
mockResponses.response5: Ge o le maemong a bohlokwa, letsetsa 10111 (maphodisa) goba 0800 428 428 (GBV Command Centre) ka pela. Polokego ya gago e bohlokwa.

footer.disclaimer: Mothušiši wa AI o a thuša fela eupša ga o tšee lefelo la tlhahlo ya dingaka. Ge o nyaka thušo ya maemo a bohlokwa, ikgokaganye le dingaka.

about.title: Ka EmpowerHub
about.subtitle: EmpowerHub e maatlafatša basadi ba Afrika Borwa ka go fa dikeletšo tša go beeletša tšhelete tšeo di rulagantšwego le dikopano, thekgo ya ka pela ya GBV le mafelo a polokego a boikhušetšo, le phihlelelo ya mabokose a mpho a bohlweki. Ye ke tharollo ya kopanyo yeo e bontšhago boikgafo bja rena bja go maatlafatša boikemelo, polokego le seriti.
about.missionText: Go hlama sethala sa kopanyo seo se maatlafatšago basadi ba Afrika Borwa ka moka ka go fa ditirelo tša thekgo tše di feletšego tšeo di lebanego le boikemelo bja tšhelete, polokego ya motho, le dinyakwa tša motheo tša bohlweki ka tharong e tee yeo e fihlelelekago.

financialEmpowerment.title: Maatlafatšo a Tšhelete
financialEmpowerment.description: Dikeletšo tša go beeletša tšhelete tšeo di rulagantšwego, dikopano tša tšhelete, le didirišwa tša go aga boikemelo bja ekonomi.

gbvSupport.title: Thekgo ya GBV
gbvSupport.description: Thekgo ya ka pela le mafelo a polokego a boikhušetšo go basadi bao ba lebanego le tlhekefetšo yeo e theilwego godimo ga bong.

sanitaryAid.title: Thušo ya Bohlweki
sanitaryAid.description: Phihlelelo ya dihlahiswa tša bohlweki tše bohlokwa ka mabokose a mpho ao a beilwego ka bohlale.

empowerment.title: Maatlafatšo
empowerment.description: Re dumela ka go maatlafatša boikemelo bja basadi ka thuto, didirišwa le thekgo.

safety.title: Polokego
safety.description: Go netefatša phihlelelo ya ka pela ya mafelo a polokego le thekgo ya basadi maemong a mathata.

dignity.title: Seriti
dignity.description: Go fa didirišwa tše bohlokwa ge go bolokwa seriti le sephiri sa mosadi yo mongwe le yo mongwe.

community.title: Setšhaba
community.description: Go aga netweke ye maatla ya thekgo ka magato ao a etelwago pele ke setšhaba le tirišanommogo.

about.techDescription: EmpowerHub e šomiša theknolotši ya sebjalebjale go fa sethala sa thekgo sa kopanyo. Pontšho ya rena ya bjale e bontšha sebereka sa modiriši le mošomo wa motheo, le meralo ya go kopanya dikarolo tše di tšwetšego pele tšeo di akaretšago:

currentFeaturesList.responsiveInterface: Sebereka sa webo seo se arabago

futureFeaturesList.aiSupport: Thekgo yeo e etelwago pele ke AI le dikeletšo
futureFeaturesList.metamask: Kopanyo ya MetaMask ya dikgwebišano tše polokego

about.demoNote: Pontšho ye e bontšha kgopolo ya tharollo ya kopanyo, yeo e rulagantšwego go dumelela tlhabollo ye e ikemetšego ya dikarolo ge go bolokwa maitemogelo a modiriši ao a swanago. Sebopego sa modular se dumelela dikatlego tša bokamoso ntle le go šitiša mošomo wa motheo.
